paragraphs.context: To fix a phone that won't turn on, try charging the phone, performing a hard reset, or checking the battery or hardware components. To fix a phone that keeps freezing or crashing, try clearing the cache, uninstalling any unnecessary apps, or performing a factory reset. To fix a phone with a cracked screen, you can either replace the screen yourself or take it to a professional repair shop. To fix a phone that won't charge, try checking the charging cable and port, cleaning the charging port, or replacing the battery or charger.

How can I unlock my iPhone if I forgot my passcode? 	You can unlock your iPhone by following the steps outlined on the Apple support website, which involve using iTunes or iCloud to reset your device.
